Articles.Content:
For whatever reason, my game keeps crashing in the middle of the loading screen. I have a ton of mods installed, but they all worked fine up until today, and nothing changed to my knowledge. I've gone through and tried to isolate the mod that's causing the issue, but for whatever reason I can't seem to find out. KSP crashes if I have any mod installed. The only way it works is if there are no mods. I tried a clean install and verifying local files, but still nothing. Any suggestions?

Here's my GameData folder

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/qxbpy9a1lq7q9p9/Screenshot%202015-07-24%2019.53.45.png?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/qxbpy9a1lq7q9p9/Screenshot%202015-07-24%2019.53.45.png?dl=0)

And the latest error log (with all original mods back in place):

[https://www.dropbox.com/sh/f972cmon9ujuhl9/AAASRjOINc4Ga9EUFiUFvHJWa?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/f972cmon9ujuhl9/AAASRjOINc4Ga9EUFiUFvHJWa?dl=0)

Any help would be greatly appreciated! Thanks!
